Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: lisa robertson
Reviews.Content: Product looks almost new, works great but have only had a few days.  Packaged well and delivered very quickly.  I bought this to replace a broken phone because our upgrade is not available until June and I am unwilling to increase my package to include a data plan.  It is a little on the small side especially for a man with bigger hands but doable.  This phone has good sound and picture quality for a basic phone and that is all we need.

ProductInfo.Features:
Feature-packed messaging phone with slide-out QWERTY keyboard, threaded messaging display, colorful 2.1-inch display
Access V CAST Music with Rhapsody service (subscription and PC downloads); GPS-enabled for turn-by-turn directions
1.3-megapixel camera for still photos; Bluetooth stereo music; microSD expansion to 16 GB; digital audio player; access to instant messaging and personal email
Up to 5 hours of talk time, up to 300 hours (12.5 days) of standby time
Your purchase will include a Cell Phone, Rechargable Battery, and Wall Charger. This is a Prepaid cell phone (Pay-as-you-go). You will be able purchase service in advanced with no long-term contracts. Please check with your service provider for plan overviews, supported features, and services.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Intensity U450 for Verizon (City Red) - QWERTY - No Contract - Camera - Prepaid
